properties.displayName: Restrict cloud shell storage account creation
properties.description: Storage accounts that you create in Cloud Shell are tagged with ms-resource-usage:azure-cloud-shell. If you want to disallow users from creating storage accounts in Cloud Shell, create an Azure resource policy for tags that is triggered by this specific tag. https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-shell/persisting-shell-storage#restrict-resource-creation-with-an-azure-resource-policy

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy
